name: SetOpeningState
description:
Update the state of a job opening.

This tool updates the state of a job opening in the Ashby platform. It should be called when it's necessary to change the status of an opening, requiring the `jobsWrite` permission.

parameters.name: opening_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the job opening to be updated.

value_schema.description: The id of the opening you want to update

parameters.name: new_opening_state
parameters.description: The new state to update the job opening to. Accepted values are 'Draft', 'Approved', 'Open', 'Closed'.

value_schema.description: The new state you want to update the opening to

parameters.name: close_reason_id
parameters.description: The ID for the reason why the opening is closed, required when setting the state to closed.

value_schema.description: The id of the close reason if you are setting the state to closed
